original: @81b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @81b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aashta ma h'a sth'a na tsee tya sto tra /
analyzed: aashta ma h'a sth'a na tsee tya sto tra /
translated: Aṣṭamahāsthānacaityastotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa /
analyzed: gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Stūpas of the Eight Great Sacred Sites

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī!

original: 'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu lumb'ir bltams //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu lumb'ir bltams //
translated: The sole guru of beings, born in Lumbinī,

original: ser skya'i grong khyer gzhi ru gnas par mdzad //
analyzed: ser skya'i grong khyer gzhi ru gnas par mdzad //
translated: Resided in the city of Kapilavastu.

original: yon tan rin chen bye bas brgyan pa yi //
analyzed: yon tan rin chen bye bas brgyan pa yi //
translated: Adorned with ten million precious qualities,

original: bde gshegs mchod rten rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bde gshegs mchod rten rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the stūpas of the Sugatas.

original: ma ga dh'a yi byang chub shing drung du //
analyzed: ma ga dh'a yi byang chub shing drung du //
translated: In the presence of the Bodhi tree in Magadha,

original: chu bo nee ranydza na zhes bya ba'i //
analyzed: chu bo nee ranydza na zhes bya ba'i //
translated: On the banks of the Nairañjanā River,

original: 'gram bzhugs mchod rten yon tan rgya che ba //
analyzed: 'gram bzhugs mchod rten yon tan rgya che ba //
translated: The stūpa with vast qualities,

original: byang chub rten du gyur la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byang chub rten du gyur la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: The support of enlightenment, I pay homage.

original: ka shi ka yi b'a r'a na s'i ru //
analyzed: ka shi ka yi b'a r'a na s'i ru //
translated: In the Kshika Vārāṇasī,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo rnam grol rmad byung ni //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo rnam grol rmad byung ni //
translated: The marvelous wheel of Dharma, the liberation,

original: nyon mongs sgrib pa rnam par gcod mdzad pa //
analyzed: nyon mongs sgrib pa rnam par gcod mdzad pa //
translated: Cutting through the obscurations of afflictions,

original: ye shes mchod rten bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ye shes mchod rten bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the four stūpas of wisdom.

original: mnyan du yod par gzhan stobs tshar bcad nas //
analyzed: mnyan du yod par gzhan stobs tshar bcad nas //
translated: In Śrāvastī, he defeated the opponents;

original: dze ta'i tshal du cho 'phrul chen po bstan //
analyzed: dze ta'i tshal du cho 'phrul chen po bstan //
translated: In Jetavana, he performed the great miracle.

original: sa gsum dgongs pa mchog tu bsgrub mdzad pa //
analyzed: sa gsum dgongs pa mchog tu bsgrub mdzad pa //
translated: He accomplished the supreme intention for the three worlds;

original: mu stegs pham mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mu stegs pham mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Caitya of the Defeat of the Tīrthikas.

original: grong khyer dam pa mchog ni gsal ldan du //
analyzed: grong khyer dam pa mchog ni gsal ldan du //
translated: In the supreme and excellent city of Kāśī,

original: lha rnams gnas gshegs bla na med par babs //
analyzed: lha rnams gnas gshegs bla na med par babs //
translated: The gods went to the abode, and he descended to the unsurpassed;

original: zhabs la tshangs dbang cod pan gyis mchod pa //
analyzed: zhabs la tshangs dbang cod pan gyis mchod pa //
translated: His feet were worshipped by the crowns of Brahmā and Indra;

original: sum cu'i lhas mchod mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sum cu'i lhas mchod mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Caitya worshipped by the Thirty-three Gods.

original: dge 'dun dbyen du sngar gyur las //
analyzed: dge 'dun dbyen du sngar gyur las //
translated: Previously, there was a schism in the Saṅgha;

original: ston pa'i nyan thos rab mthun pa //
analyzed: ston pa'i nyan thos rab mthun pa //
translated: The Teacher's śrāvakas were greatly harmonious.

original: rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal //
analyzed: rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal //
translated: In Rājagṛha's Bamboo Grove,

original: byams nges mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byams nges mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Caitya of Maitrī.

original: sku tshe 'du byed btang ba las //
analyzed: sku tshe 'du byed btang ba las //
translated: From the relinquishment of the components of life,

original: slar yang sku tshe byin brlabs pa //
analyzed: slar yang sku tshe byin brlabs pa //
translated: He blessed his life once again.

original: rnam grol yangs pa can gyi ni //
analyzed: rnam grol yangs pa can gyi ni //
translated: In Vaiśālī, the liberated one;

original: byin rlabs mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: byin rlabs mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Caitya of the Blessing.

original: ku sha'i grong du 'gro ba @82a * //
analyzed: ku sha'i grong du 'gro ba @82a * //
translated: In the city of Kuśinagara, the one who goes to the end;

original: rnams ; / dge ba la ni sbyor mdzad cing //
analyzed: rnams ; / dge ba la ni sbyor mdzad cing //
translated: And they are engaged in virtue.

original: 'gran med gyad gnas zung gi tshal //
analyzed: 'gran med gyad gnas zung gi tshal //
translated: In the incomparable wrestling arena of the twin trees,

original: mchod rten mya ngan 'das phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: mchod rten mya ngan 'das phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to the stūpa of parinirvāṇa.🔽The eight stūpas of Śākyamuni's worship,

original: sh'akya thub mchod rten brgyad po dag / phyogs bcu gzhan dang gzhan rnams na //
analyzed: sh'akya thub mchod rten brgyad po dag / phyogs bcu gzhan dang gzhan rnams na //
translated: In the other and other directions of the ten directions,

original: bzhugs pa'i chos sku kun la 'dud //
analyzed: bzhugs pa'i chos sku kun la 'dud //
translated: I bow to all the dharmakāya abodes.

original: zhi la rtag tu spyis phyag 'tshal ;
analyzed: zhi la rtag tu spyis phyag 'tshal ;
translated: I always bow to Śānti with my head.

original: /'di ltar spros pa kun bral dpe med rtag cing dag pa'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: /'di ltar spros pa kun bral dpe med rtag cing dag pa'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: Thus, free from all conceptual elaborations, incomparable, eternal, and of the nature of purity,

original: sangs rgyas chos sku mkha' ltar 'gro ba la khyab yang dag phyag 'tshal bas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos sku mkha' ltar 'gro ba la khyab yang dag phyag 'tshal bas //
translated: I pay homage to the dharmakāya of the Buddha, which pervades the sky-like world.

original: bsod nams gangs ri'i kha dog ltar dkar bdag gi rgyud la gang bsags pa //
analyzed: bsod nams gangs ri'i kha dog ltar dkar bdag gi rgyud la gang bsags pa //
translated: The merit I have accumulated, as white as the snow mountain,🔽By that, may all sentient beings attain enlightenment, realizing the bliss of samādhi.

original: des ni sems can ma lus ting 'dzin bde rtogs byang chub thob par shog / gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa /
analyzed: des ni sems can ma lus ting 'dzin bde rtogs byang chub thob par shog / gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa /
translated: The praise of the stūpas of the eight great sites

original: slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: is completed.
